| HistoryText             = 
===Origin===
With an increasing number in the student body, [[Scott Summers (Earth-616)|Cyclops]] & [[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|Emma Frost]] reorganized the [[Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters|Xavier Institute]]'s educational and training program.{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #1}} The Exemplars Squad was advised by [[Henry McCoy (Earth-616)|Beast]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #10}}{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 13}}

===Field Day===
The Exemplars Squad held fourth place for most of the field day rankings.{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #10}}

===Members===
* [[Angel Salvadore (Earth-616)|Angel]] - Angel Salvadore had a pair of insectoid wings mounted on her back. She was the only known member of the Exemplars Squad. Depowered.{{r|Decimation: House of M - The Day After #1}} 

===M-Day===
After [[Decimation|M-Day]] only 27 of 182 enrolled Xavier's students retained their powers. The Exemplars Squad was disbanded along with all the other [[X-Men Training Squads]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #20|#23}}

| Trivia                  = * The squad was possibly named after the [[Exemplars (Earth-616)|Exemplars]], a team of godly-empowered villains, encountered by the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]] and [[Charles Xavier (Earth-616)|Professor X]], both related to the squad's adviser [[Henry McCoy (Earth-616)|Beast]].
* The Exemplars Squad was never seen fully on-panel.
